About

Parallax or not, this plugin gives lots of feature to work CSS animation on scroll event, given by jQuery.

Download

  • Tarball
  • Zip
  • Fork us on GitHub

Features

  • Vertical and horizontal scrolling support
  • Multiple CSS animations for the same element
  • CSS3 Transform (rotate, skew and scale)
  • Start CSS animation when specific element appears on screen
  • CSS Properties
    • top
    • right
    • bottom
    • left
    • margin-top
    • margin-right
    • margin-bottom
    • margin-left
    • opacity
    • font-size
    • transform: rotate
    • transform: skew
    • transform: scale
